chart.title: Number of children under 5 years old
chart.subtitle: Projections from 2022 onwards are based on the UN's medium scenario.

Population - Sex: all - Age: 0-4 - Varia.descriptionShort: De facto total population in a country, area or region as of 1 July of the year indicated. This only includes individuals aged 0-4.
